Package com.deliveroo.cron.util

Class FragmentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveroo.cron.util.FragmentHandler
  • public class FragmentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Exposes handlers to generate valid field values for cron expressions
    Since:
    19-Jun-2022

      • handleAllValuePatternMatch

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> handleAllValuePatternMatch​(int minValue,
                                                                          int maxValue)
        Returns all values between min value and max value (incremented by unity)
        Parameters:
        minValue - min value
        maxValue - max value
        Returns:
        Set of all values between min and max (both inclusive)

      • handleSingleNumericMatch

        public static java.lang.Integer handleSingleNumericMatch​(java.lang.String inputValue,
                                                         int minValue,
                                                         int maxValue)
        Returns the Integer represented by the inputValue string, if valid.
        Parameters:
        inputValue - Single input value as provided
        minValue - min value
        maxValue - max value
        Returns:
        Set of all values between min and max (both inclusive)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is not valid or out of range

      • handleNumericRangePatternMatch

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> handleNumericRangePatternMatch​(java.lang.String startValue,
                                                                              java.lang.String endValue,
                                                                              int minValue,
                                                                              int maxValue)
        Returns all valid integers between the start and end value.
        Parameters:
        startValue - start value as provided
        endValue - end value as provided
        minValue - min value
        maxValue - max value
        Returns:
        Set of all values between min and max (both inclusive)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is not valid or out of range

      • handleStepPatternMatch

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> handleStepPatternMatch​(java.lang.String startValue,
                                                                      java.lang.String endValue,
                                                                      java.lang.String stepValue,
                                                                      int minValue,
                                                                      int maxValue)
        Return list of valid values for the step function
        Parameters:
        startValue - start value of the range defined
        endValue - end value of the range defined
        stepValue - step value to increment (if out of range, use Max+1 as default)
        minValue - min value
        maxValue - max value
        Returns:
        Set of all values between min and max (both inclusive) incremented by step value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is not valid or out of range

      • handleOnlyAlphabetPatternMatch

        public static java.lang.Integer handleOnlyAlphabetPatternMatch​(CronFieldType fieldType,
                                                               java.lang.String inputValue,
                                                               int minValue,
                                                               int maxValue)
        Returns single integer value, as defined by the input value (String).
        Parameters:
        fieldType - Cron expression field type
        inputValue - Input word as provided
        minValue - min value
        maxValue - max value
        Returns:
        Single value representing the input word
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is not valid or out of range
        See Also:
        NameToIntegerMap
